thread.title: DIARY-Emerging Markets Economic Events to Aug 27
thread.title_full: DIARY-Emerging Markets Economic Events to Aug 27 | Reuters

author: Reuters
title: DIARY-Emerging Markets Economic Events to Aug 27
text:
Aug 17 (Reuters) -
For other diaries, please see:
Top economic events
Government debt auctions
Political and general news events
Index of all diaries
Guide to economic indicators
** This Diary is filed daily ***
TUESDAY, AUGUST 18
MUMBAI, India - Indian Finance Minister Arun Jaitley and junior finance minister Jayant will attend an event organised by Small Industries Development Bank of India. The event is meant to spur more lending to smaller enterprises - 0130 GMT. WARSAW - National Bank of Poland holds Monetary Policy Council meeting. Interest rate announcement not expected. ANKARA - Central bank of Turkey to hold monetary policy committee meeting to set interest rates. JAKARTA - Indonesia Central Bank holds board of governors meeting, followed by press conference.
WEDNESDAY, AUGUST 19 WINDHOEK - Central bank of Namibia announces rate decision - 1000 GMT. ANKARA - Central bank of Turkey to hold meeting with economists - 0730 GMT.
THURSDAY, AUGUST 20
JAKARTA, Indonesia - Federal Reserve Bank of San Francisco releases text of speech of Federal Reserve Bank of San Francisco President John Williams before the Bank Indonesia-BIS Research Conference in Jakarta - 0645 GMT. SEOUL, South Korea - Federal Reserve Bank of Minneapolis President Narayana Kocherlakota speaks before the "Macroeconomic Policy and Price Measurement Issues in a Low Inflation Environment" conference - 0020 GMT.
MONDAY, AUGUST 24 JERUSALEM - Bank of Israel announces interest rate decision - 1300 GMT.
TUESDAY, AUGUST 25
BUDAPEST - Central Bank of Hungary rate-setting meeting - 1200 GMT.
THURSDAY, AUGUST 27 KIGALI - National bank of Rwanda holds monetary policy meeting - 0630 GMT.
